amendment.description: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to defund the Communications Equity and Diversity Council at the FCC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
